title: dd element
description: Description list - description element. See [the `dl` element](/tech/html/dl_element) for more information.

references.title: WHATWG HTML spec for the dd element
HTML AAM for the dd element

assertions.rationale: A user needs to be able to distinguish between a description term and its description.

examples: A screen reader might convey the position of each item in the list as something like "x of y" where y is the number of items in the list.
A screen reader might convey each term and description pair as a single item, or as separate items. For example, a screen reader might convey the size of a list of 3 pairs as either 3 or 6.
